channel.description: Week 5 Announcements This Week Tues: Lab 4 Due 7 PM Fri: Week 5 Quizzes Next Mon: Lab 5 Next Mon: Week 5 Discussion Lab 4 Grading Windows Server Windows AD User/Group Windows -> AD OpenLDAP User/Group Ubuntu -> LDAP Ubuntu -> AD Success Read Carefully See Posted Diagrams Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Speaker: Beocat Admin Kyle Hutson Manage K-State's Supercomputer Experience with Powerful Hardware Cloud vs. On Prem Scientific Computing Lab 5 Move to Cloud 2 Droplets on DO Set up SSH & Firewall Simple Apache Sites DNS Name Docker Reverse Proxy GitHub Pack https://education.github.com/pack
